name: Cheesecake Distribution Center
description:
Cheesecake Distribution Center is a game all about managing your own cheesecake shop and making beautiful, unique cakes. This is a first-person, 3D, single-player, task-based management game that focuses on the player’s time management and ability to create cheesecakes that are up to par.

Created by Tyler Lamp, Taetum Knebel, Jacob Kasparian, Shelby Colson, and Joshua Boyd
